sources.title: Widow's Point | Full Supernatural Horror Movie | Craig Sheffer
sources.description:
An Author spends a weekend locked in a Haunted Lighthouse as a publicity stunt to promote his new book. The lighthouse has a dark past & what lies within is not something that should ever have been disturbed.
2019.  Stars: Craig Sheffer, KateLynn E. Newberry, Dominic Luongo

metadata.Plot: Thomas Livingston, an author desperate for a hit, spends a weekend locked in a haunted lighthouse as a publicity stunt for his next book. As Livingston delves into the lighthouse's terrifying history, he is targeted by powerful supernatural forces.
metadata.Writer: Billy Chizmar, Richard Chizmar, Gregory Lamberson
metadata.Actors: Craig Sheffer, KateLynn E. Newberry, Dominic Luongo
